articles.description: Red Bull’s Max Verstappen wins his fourth consecutive World Drivers’ Championship as George Russell takes race victory in the Las Vegas Grand Prix.
articles.title: Max Verstappen wins fourth world title as George Russell triumphs in Las Vegas Grand Prix

articles.description: After Man City's 4-0 humbling to Tottenham made it five defeats in a row, BBC Sport looks at what is going wrong for the Premier League champions.
articles.title: Man City 0-4 Tottenham: What is going wrong for the Premier League champions?

articles.description: From rejection at Benfica to new Manchester United boss, BBC Sport charts the rise of Ruben Amorim.
articles.title: Ruben Amorim: The story of Man Utd's new manager branded the 'second Special One'

articles.description: Brazil legend Marta celebrates the first NWSL championship of her glittering career after the Orlando Pride beat the Washington Spirit 1-0 on Saturday.
articles.title: NWSL championship: Barbra Banda scores to help Orlando Pride and Marta win first title

articles.description: Victor Wembanyama scores 25 points on his return as the San Antonio Spurs fight back for a 104-94 win over the Golden State Warriors.
articles.title: NBA: Victor Wembanyama returns as San Antonio Spurs beat Golden State Warriors

articles.description: BBC tennis correspondent Russell Fuller assesses what Novak Djokovic's shock appointment of Andy Murray as coach could mean for both men.
articles.title: Andy Murray coaching Novak Djokovic: What it could mean for friends and rivals

articles.title: Wales rugby crisis: Warren Gatland to learn fate in coming days

articles.title: Australia v India - Cricket - BBC Sport

articles.description: Ruben Amorim says "I believe in myself and I believe in the club" in his firstnews conference since taking over as Manchester United head coach.
articles.title: Ruben Amorim: Man Utd head coach says he believes in himself and in the club
